1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Sulaiman bin Buraidah narrated from his father that:The Prophet used to perform ablution for every prayer, but on the day of the conquest of Makkah, he performed all of the prayers with one ablution

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوُضُوءِ لِكُلِّ صَلاَةٍ وَالصَّلَوَاتِ كُلِّهَا بِوُضُوءٍ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Performing ablution for each prayer and offering all prayers in one ablution
